sentences.en: According to local lore, a ghost still haunts the castle.
sentences.cn: 根据当地人的传说，城堡里至今仍然闹鬼。

sentences.en: Carrie became wise in theatrical lore, hearing the gossip of little Lola.
sentences.cn: 听着小萝拉的闲言碎语,嘉莉开始了解戏剧界的情况了.

sentences.en: Early peoples passed on and animal lore through legend.
sentences.cn: 古代的人通过传说把他们知道的关于动植物的知识传给后代.

sentences.en: Early peoples passed on plant and animal lore through legend.
sentences.cn: 早期人类通过传说传递有关植物和动物的知识.

sentences.en: Even today , romantic lore commonly identifies chocolate as an aphrodisiac.
sentences.cn: 浪漫的民间传说通常认为巧克力是一种催情剂.

sentences.en: He has his Provensal legendary lore at his fingers'ends.
sentences.cn: 他对普罗旺斯地区的口头传说了如指掌.

sentences.en: He sought out the old farmers and collected their weather lore.
sentences.cn: 他找一些老农搜集了他预测天气的经验.

sentences.en: Herb Lore ( Level 2 ) - You understand the secrets of herbs.
sentences.cn: 药草知识 ( 要求等级2级 ) 你能理解药草的秘密.

sentences.en: I could spice my talk with Talmudic lore, too.
sentences.cn: 我还能够把一些犹太法典的知识融会于我的谈论之中.

sentences.en: I will seek and question him of his lore.
sentences.cn: 我倒要找上他,向他讨教他的渊博的学问.

sentences.en: I would speed tne vast career of civilising lore.
sentences.cn: 我要尽快地充实浩瀚的知识宝库.

sentences.en: In Gnostic lore, Sophia was the mother of all angels.
sentences.cn: 在诺斯替教的传说中, 苏菲亚是天使之母.

sentences.en: Melville incorporated in " Moby Dick " an exhaustive encyclopaedia of whaling lore.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔在《白鲸 》 中汇集了各种捕鲸知识.

sentences.en: Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore?
sentences.cn: 沉思许多古怪而离奇、早已被人遗忘的传闻?

sentences.en: They almost certainly accepted at face value most of this lore.
sentences.cn: 他们当然会按表面的意义基本上接受这种提法.

sentences.en: Tribal lore and custom have been passed down orally.
sentences.cn: 部落的知识和风俗口耳相传保存下来.

words.tran_cn: 知识；学问；全部传说；（动物的）眼光知识

trans.tran_cn: （专门的）知识，学问，口头传说，[动]眼端，眼光
trans.tran_en: knowledge or information about a subject, for example nature or magic, that is not written down but is passed from person to person
